title: Lawmakers urge Biden administration to crack down on use of crypto by Hamas
description:
A bipartisan group of lawmakers has voiced deep apprehension over recent reports concerning the exploitation of cryptocurrencies by terrorist organizations, including Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad (PIJ), to finance their operations and sidestep U.S. sanctions. In a joint letter sent to top U.S. officials, the lawmakers forcefully called on the Biden administration to take prompt […]

The post Lawmakers urge Biden administration to crack down on use of crypto by Hamas appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Shiba Inu ($SHIB) Price Reclaims Vital Level; Eos ($EOS) and InQubeta ($QUBE) Momentum Builds
description: Going into the last quarter of the year, the overall cryptocurrency market has been dishing out underwhelming performances even after ending September on a positive note. But things are looking up. An insight into this optimism is the performance of Shiba Inu ($SHIB), which has regained a key level after suffering months of weak momentum [...]

title: Hong Kong FinTech Week 2023 “Fintech Redefined.”
description:
Invest Hong Kong (InvestHK) today (October 18) unveiled details of Hong Kong FinTech Week 2023 (HKFW). The eighth edition of HKFW, themed “Fintech Redefined.” will take place from October 30 to November 5. This flagship event lies at the core of global fintech innovations and aims to shape the future of fintech across various dimensions […]

The post Hong Kong FinTech Week 2023 “Fintech Redefined.” appeared first on Coin Edition.
